text: Jyā prakārē āmhī tumacyāta, tumacyāmadhūnaca rasūla (paigambara muham'mada sallallāhu alaihi vasallama) yānnā pāṭhavilē, jō āmacyā āyatī (pavitra kura'āna) tumacyāsamōra vācūna aikavitō āṇi tumhālā svaccha śud'dha karatō āṇi tumhālā grantha āṇi hikamata (bud'dhimānatā) śikavitō āṇi tyā gōṣṭīcē jñāna dētō, jyāviṣayī tumhī ajāṇa hōtē
